title: Ring of bright water
creator_credit: Jack Couffer, Joseph Strick and Palomar Pictures
brief_description: Graham Merril (Bill Travers), a discontented civil servant and his pet otter flee London and head to the western Highlands when they realise city life is not for either of them. He seeks the assistance of local doctor, Mary Mackenzie (Virginia McKenna), to help him and his family of otters.
